m_szDocTitle: My Interview for Mashable: EVs, Bikes, & Carsharing Rockin' It | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: July 1st, 2012 by Zachary Shahan   Last month, I was a bit shocked to find out that a blogger for Mashable wanted to interview me for a Mashable series on “5 startups improving society through technology.” Mashable, as you probably know, is one of the most popular websites on the planet. As just one example of that, it’s got nearly 1 million Facebook fans! Of course, I jumped on the opportunity. Because the Mashable blogger, Stephanie Buck, was interviewing me about electric vehicles, I also bounced the questions off some of our colleagues on Gas2 and other writers here on CleanTechnica.
